home.title: You are Welcome
home.user3: to a profile under a ready-made profile or
home.des1: Online store 'E-commerce' - built entirely on requests.
home.des2: - Implemented a basket of goods, sorting of goods by category, search by name.
home.des3: - There is a personal account for buyers, where you can view user information and order history & a personal account for the administrator, where you can add a category or a new product.
home.des4: - The administrator can also edit an existing product in the product card.
home.des5: - It is possible to register and select a profile category (administrator/buyer).
home.des6: - Loading of products to the page has been implemented.
home.des8: - It is possible to change the Russian language to English.
home.des10: - BackEnd is made using JSON Server.
